info.title: Ackermans-Location
info.description: This API exposes Master Data related to Ackermans. (For internal Use only)

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the Company. Used when you want to retrieve a set of branches linked to a specific company.

parameters.name: branchId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the Branch. Used when you want to retrieve a specific branch.

parameters.name: branchTypeCode
parameters.description: Unique identifier for a Branch type. Used when you want a specific type of branch.

parameters.name: provinceId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the Province. Used when you want to retireve a set of branches within a specific province.
